lenders.name: epSos.de
lenders.loan_because:
Investing resources into progressive people does create a better future for us all.

Plus, the initial investment is returned quickly, so that the loans are very fair to the lender. This way the system of help works better than regular charity without returns, because lenders have an opportunity to reinvest their initial capital many times to multiple creative people in need.

This way the effect of micro loans is much greater than basic charity.
lenders.occupational_info: Everything on the Internet is created by someone. Some of those who create the Internet is epSos.de

lenders.name: Petra
lenders.loan_because: My son, 20 years old and now volonteer in Mediation work in Northern ireland, has sent me a Kiva-voucher as birthday present. I wish Hawa Abdala the very best for her brick business and her family, Petra from Quakenbrück
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor for family medicine in Quakenbrueck, a 13.000 inhabitants town in Germany. I am vice-mayor of our town and habe many honorary posts. Besides I teach young physiotherapists and diet specialists in internal medicine. I am 51 years old and have 4 children:Martin, 20,  now in Belfast, and the triplets Mona, Tobias and Clemens,18, still in school. My husband Thomas is kind of a "doctor for the poorest". He works in an institution for children and adults with severe mental and physical handicaps.

lenders.name: Maggie, Corie & Mom
lenders.loan_because:
My great-grandmother's youngest child died in the desert during the Armenian Genocide of 1916. She herself died a short time later without knowing if her two teenage daughters would survive. 

When my family was having economic problems in the 1990s, I took comfort knowing that I would never have to face such horror. And I knew that regardless of how bad our situation became, my children would grow up with a good education and potential for a great future. It is horrible that impoverished mothers in other countries can't even count on that. 

My first loan is from a gift certificate given to me by my children to celebrate Mother's Day 2009. I can't think of a more meaningful gift!

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because:
I am in awe of these people. 
Compared to myself, they have so little, both monetarily and in terms of opportunities and education. And yet, they have made the most of the situation and are indeed rising above it. 
If I am unwilling to join them in their enterprises, I will at least do my damnedest to support them!
lenders.occupational_info: I study! Economics and sciences and a little bit of this and that, just to keep things interesting.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because:
It is a socially responsible thing to do. If those of us who have been fortunate enough to have been born into wealthy societies loan money to financially responsible people in poorer societies in an effort to not only increase their quality of life, but that of the people in their community, we encourage responsible commerce to help build societies up without the use of non-sustainable donations or charities (which have their own place and time).

As a Humanist I believe it is our responsibility to care for our fellow human beings--we cannot rely on the mercy of a supernatural being and instead it is our own actions that help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer programmers to ensure that the programs they are creating work the way they are supposed to.

lenders.name: Karina
lenders.loan_because: I simply love being able to lend a helping hand. In this case, it has a long term effect through micro-financing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dedicated student who raises money to lend to entrepreneurs on KIVA.

lenders.occupational_info: I run a non-government social service organization that helps families to raise their children and helps seniors to live healthy lives in their home for as long as possible.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I cannot find microcredits for starting businnes in my country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a theatrical director and web designer, but I cannot find permanent job. I want to create small service for making 3d photos and postcards in my city. Now I have some equipment  but I need 2000$ for starting my little businnes.

lenders.name: Roxanne
lenders.loan_because: I've been inspired throughout my life by the kindness and generosity of certain individuals, and have also been the recipient of financial help in times of need. I am now fortunate enough to be in a position to help others myself. I can't think of a better way to thank those who have helped me and my family.
